column3: Cases Pending Trial from the Previous Year (Col.3)
column4: Cases sent for Trial during the Year (Col.4)
column5: Total Cases for Trial during the Year (Col.5) = (Col.3+4)
column6: Number of Cases withdrawn by the Govt. (Col.6)
column7: Number of Cases Disposed by Plea Bargaining (Col.7)
column9: Cases in which Trials were Completed (Col.9) = (Col. 10+ Col.11)
column12: Total Cases Disposed off by Courts (Col.12) = (Col.6+ Col.7+ Col.8+ Col.9)
column13: Total Cases Pending Trial at the End of the Year (Col.13) = (Col.5-Col.12)
